block_comment: This Verilog block manages a data valid flag based on the validity of inputted and outputted data and the acceptance flag. When a positive edge clock signal comes, it checks if the output data is valid, if the write operation is not happening and if the input data is accepted; under these conditions, it sets the "wait_rdata_valid_r" flag to true. Conversely, if the input data becomes valid, it resets "wait_rdata_valid_r" to false.
